hours: The club is open Monday to Friday from 6:00 to 22:00, and weekends from 8:00 to 20:00.
pool_hours: The swimming pool is available daily from 6:00 to 21:30. Last entry is 45 minutes before closing.
sauna_hours: The sauna area is open from 14:00 to 22:00 on weekdays and from 10:00 to 20:00 at weekends.
kids_zone: The Kids Zone operates on Saturdays and Sundays from 10:00 to 18:00. Children must be supervised by an adult.
membership_price: Monthly memberships start from £29. We also offer quarterly and annual plans, as well as discounts for students and seniors.
membership_types: We offer membership types including: Open, Off-Peak, Pool & Gym, and Family. Full details are available at reception or on our website.
entry_policy: Access to the club is via the mobile app or your membership card. Every visit is registered in our system.
classes_booking: Group classes can be booked through our mobile app or by contacting reception.
classes_cancellation: Classes can be cancelled up to 2 hours before the start time. Late cancellations are subject to a fee according to our price list.
classes_limit: Class sizes are limited. Bookings are handled on a first-come, first-served basis.
instructors: Information about class instructors is available in the app or on the notice board outside the fitness studio.
parking: Members are entitled to 2 hours of free parking. Please collect a ticket on entry and keep it for exit.
bike_racks: Bike racks are available outside the club. Please secure your bicycle with your own lock.
personal_trainer: You can book a personal training session at reception or directly with your chosen trainer.
personal_trainer_prices: Personal training sessions start from £25. Discounted multi-session packages are also available.
contract_freeze: Memberships can be frozen once per year for up to 30 days. The freeze fee is £5.
contract_termination: To cancel your membership, please complete a cancellation form at reception. A 30-day notice period applies.
contract_transfer: Memberships can be transferred to another person for an administrative fee of £7.
wifi: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the club. Network name: FITNESS_WIFI, password: training2024.
towels: Towels can be rented at reception for £1. We recommend using a towel during your workout.
equipment_rules: Please return equipment to its designated place after use and wipe down machines once you finish.
locker_room: Lockers operate with a PIN code. If you forget your code, please speak to reception.
showers: Showers are available at all times. We recommend wearing flip-flops for hygiene reasons.
lost_items: Lost property can be collected from reception. Items are stored for 30 days.
age_policy: Members under 16 must be accompanied by an adult or a qualified trainer to use the facilities.
rules: The full club rules are available on our website and at reception.
app_help: If you experience issues with the mobile app, please ensure it is updated to the latest version or contact reception for assistance.
payments: We accept card payments, contactless payments, and recurring direct debit options.
invoices: If you require a VAT invoice for your membership, please request one at reception or via email.
maintenance: Current maintenance works and temporarily closed areas are listed on the notice board at the entrance and in the mobile app.
cleaning_breaks: Some areas may be temporarily closed for cleaning. Notifications are posted in advance whenever possible.
safety: If you feel unwell or injure yourself, please notify a member of staff immediately. An AED defibrillator is located at reception.
faq_no_info: Sorry, I couldn’t find an answer to that question. Is there anything else I can help with?
